### AWS Setup

* Choose an AMI on EC2
* Ubuntu 16.04
* Instance Size: 2 core; 4 GB RAM; 128 GB Disk

### Open ports in the security group

* Port 8787
* Port 3939
* Port 80

### Create a pem key and connect to instance

```{bash}
ssh -i ~/.ssh/my.pem ubuntu@<ip>
```

### Update

```{bash}
sudo apt-get update
```

### Add a user

```{bash}
sudo useradd -m rstudio
sudo echo "rstudio:mypassword" | chpasswd
```
